item.description:
DARE To Be Phenomenal is a community of like minded women who are looking to take their business and their life to a whole new level and are willing to dare themselves to the limit in order to have a phenomenal life! Is this you?
Whether you are an entrepreneur, business professional, small business owner or someone interested in changing your current circumstances to pursue your true passion, Dare To Be Phenomenal is here for you. We look forward to helping you on your journey to becoming the phenomenal woman we know you are!
Together we will:
·Support each other as we take risks in our life and business! ·Share tips and techniques on business strategies and profitability! ·Encourage one another to be the bold, courageous, and fearless! ·Hold the vision of that phenomenal life that we want! ·Make new friends, forge new relationships and provide support and inspiration along the way! ·Swap business cards and watch our personal business directories grow!
Join our community and get involved!!
We also have a facebook fan page at: http://www.facebook.com/home.php#/pages/DARE-To-Be-Phenomenal/125357562159?ref=nf
Join the fan page and get all the latest up-to-date information happening at DARE To Be Phenomenal
item.name: Dare To Be Phenomenal's Success Minded Women's Network
